Might anyone know why my mic volume goes down when I turn the nob to my volume button? I have a Logitech G15 Keyboard. Anyone??
does it go down either way?
Like if you turn your volume up or down?
No, only the mic goes down. I was wondering if there is a configuration for this
Wapko, thats what i am asking, is how I do that. :)
Lewench, so instead of controlling your speaker  volume, it controlls your mic volume?
after you figure out... tell me, because controlling my mic volume is more important to me then speaker volume, and that would come in handy
Wapko, wow i wish i wasn't stupid >.<
In this video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZD7QraljRfM after the drags a window and places is somewhere else there is like a ripple effect on the sides. Anyone know what that option is ???

Lewench, Assuming you're using GNOME, you need to go into System>Preferences>Sound. At the bottom of that window there's a list. The mic will be selected. Change that to your speaker's channel (you may have to experiment to find the one. Names vary from card to card)
Thanks a bunch!!!! now you know how to do it as well :-p
